definition[0]: if a person is underinsured, the value of the health care for which they are insured is less than they need
example[0]: We must focus on ensuring that low-income, underinsured residents can get decent health care.
definition[1]: if property or its owners are underinsured and the property is stolen, damaged etc, the owners will receive less from the insurance company than the property is worth
example[1]: With our revaluation scheme, providing you were not underinsured to start with, you need no longer worry about becoming underinsured as a result of inflation.
